Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Removes library taxes of the East Syracuse-Minoa central school district from real property located in that portion of such school district that is located within the Northern Onondaga public library district
Summary: Removes library taxes of the East Syracuse-Minoa central school district from real property located in that portion of such school district that is located within the Northern Onondaga public library district.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to removing library taxes of the East Syracuse-Minoa central school district from real property located in that portion of such school district that is located within the Northern Onondaga public library district
